alert.note: Alert for Bronx; Northern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 07 at 2:45AM EST until January 07 at 10:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Bronx and Northern Queens Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Potential exists for widespread moderate to locally major coastal flooding with the Wednesday AM high tide next week in response to a strong storm system affecting the region late Tuesday into Wednesday. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. LITTLE NECK BAY AT KINGS POINT NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 10.0 FT, MODERATE 10.5 FT, MAJOR 13.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 2.2 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 5.2 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 06/08 PM 7.6/ 8.1 -0.2/ 0.2 1.8/ 2.2 2 NONE 07/07 AM 10.0/10.5 2.2/ 2.7 3.0/ 3.5 2 MINOR 07/08 PM 7.1/ 7.6 -0.8/-0.2 1.0/ 1.5 1 NONE 08/09 AM 8.6/ 9.1 0.8/ 1.3 1.4/ 1.9 1 NONE 08/09 PM 7.1/ 7.6 -0.8/-0.2 0.7/ 1.1 1 NONE 09/09 AM 8.3/ 8.8 0.5/ 1.0 0.6/ 1.1 0 NONE &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
